# Jiakai Gu's Blog

> `Jiakai Gu's Blog` is a personal technology blog focusing on sharing tech and personal experiences.

## Main Sections

- [Home Page](https://blog.gujiakai.top/en/): Home Page
- [Archive](https://blog.gujiakai.top/en/archive/): Archive Page
- [Tags](https://blog.gujiakai.top/en/tags/): Tags Page
- [Til](https://blog.gujiakai.top/en/til/): Til Page
- [About](https://blog.gujiakai.top/en/about/): About Page

## Content

- [Reflections on Claude Max](https://blog.gujiakai.top/en/2026/01/claude-max-aftertaste/): Sharing my experience with my second Claude Max subscription.
